channel.title: Command Log? List all commands typed?
channel.description:
Server Base: 317 PI Client: AbstractPK remake of TeamTrova Action: Command Logs
Message: I want to make a command list that logs all commands typed into a folder with there username. In the file I would like it to be listed like CommandLog, and when you open it, it will list all users to entered a command. In there files I would like it to be listed like this:
[code] Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21 Command Entered: "Command" By Someone -------------------------------------------------- Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21 Command Entered: "Command" By Someone -------------------------------------------------- Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21 Command Entered: "Command" By Someone -------------------------------------------------- Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21 Command Entered: "Command" By Someone --------------------------------------------------[/code]
Could someone offer me some assist me with in this?

item.title: Command Log? List all commands typed?
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

Server Base: 317 PI
Client: AbstractPK remake of TeamTrova
Action: Command Logs

Message:
I want to make a command list that logs all commands typed into a folder with there username.
In the file I would like it to be listed like CommandLog, and when you open it, it will list all users to entered a command. In there files I would like it to be listed like this:

[code]
Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21
Command Entered: “Command” By Someone

Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21
Command Entered: “Command” By Someone

Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21
Command Entered: “Command” By Someone

Year : 2012 Month : 0 Day : 21
Command Entered: “Command” By Someone
--------------------------------------------------[/code]

Could someone offer me some assist me with in this?

Read full topic
item.source: Command Log? List all commands typed?
